mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_ai_usage_log (user_id, feature_type, model_name, input_token, output_token, total_cost, request_count, usage_status, error_message, log_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{featureType}, #{modelName}, #{inputToken}, #{outputToken}, #{totalCost}, #{requestCount}, #{usageStatus}, #{errorMessage}, #{logDate})
